name: Kinkshamed at the Pub Crawl
description:
Art by Tamyra C and S. Berry
Soundtrack courtesy of BENSKY

Laina's a bartender/waitress/line-cook at McGreevys, a vaguely Irish-themed bar and grill plopped in the middle of a small college town. Not exactly making a killing slinging beer and frying wings, Laina had recently inquired about a eccentric "alternative modeling" position online with a couple in a city up north. All seemed fine and on the level, until internet piracy led to Lainas side-job to become the talk of the town. Timing couldn't have been worse, as the incident becomes known just as McGreevys is set to host a leg of a local pub crawl. Though Lainas newest friends and business partners promise to make things right come the big day, she justifiably doubts their ability and braces for a a particularly brutal event.

Play as Laina and finish the night serving food, tending bar, and bantering with drunken 20-somethings as she finishes up her shift as the towns newest internet sensation.
